_comment_1: === MODEL CROSS TRAINER - AUTO ANNOTATOR CONFIG ===
_comment_2: This tool uses an existing ONNX model to auto-annotate images for a new dataset
_comment_model_path: Path to the ONNX model file to use for detection
_comment_model_classes_path: Path to the source model's classes.txt (one class name per line)
_comment_labels_dir: Directory where YOLO format annotation .txt files will be saved
_comment_target_classes_path: Path to target dataset's classes.txt. If empty or missing classes, they will be added automatically
_comment_classes_to_detect: List of class names from the source model to detect. Must match names in model_classes_path exactly
_comment_confidence_threshold: Minimum confidence score (0.0-1.0) for a detection to be saved. Default: 0.3
_comment_use_nms: Enable Non-Maximum Suppression to filter overlapping detections. Default: false
_comment_nms_iou_threshold: IoU threshold for NMS (only used if use_nms is true). Higher = more overlapping boxes kept. Default: 0.5
